detail_desc: Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low, V-shaped waist and cutaway coverage at the back.

Short dress in patterned plumeti chiffon with short, softly draping sleeves and an open section at the back with a covered button at the back of the neck. Gathered seam under the bust, a concealed zip at the back and a gently flared skirt. Lined in jersey made from recycled polyester.
Maxi dress in softly draping viscose jersey with narrow, tie-top shoulder straps. Unlined.
Short, sleeveless top in patterned, waffled cotton jersey with a deep neckline, shell buttons at the top and a seam and flared frill at the hem.

Tailored, high-waisted shorts in woven fabric. Concealed elastication at the waist and a concealed zip and two pairs of hook-and-eye fasteners at one side. Side pockets with decorative metal studs, fake welt back pockets and short slits in the sides.
Short shorts in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist, and side pockets.
Blouse in a cotton weave with embroidered sections. Small frilled collar, pin-tucks and concealed buttons down the front, and long, wide sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Long-sleeved tops in soft cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y).
Gloves in a soft, fine knit with ribbed cuffs.

Lightly padded parka in woven fabric with a brushed velvety finish. Detachable, lined hood with a quilted edge and fake drawstring with leather details, a stand-up collar, zip with a chin guard and wind flap with toggles. Patch front pockets with a flap and button, fake welt chest pockets, a small appliqué on one sleeve, inner ribbing at the cuffs and a single back vent. Removable lining.
Oversized jumper in a soft, rib-knit wool blend with a stand-up collar and low dropped shoulders.
Shorts in soft, stretch denim with worn details, a fake fly and press-stud at the waist, fake front pockets and real back pockets. Detachable elastic braces with imitation leather details.
Bomber jacket in a nylon weave with a ribbed stand-up collar and zip down the front. Zipped side pockets, a double pocket on one sleeve, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Jersey lining.

Trousers in soft, brushed wool twill with elastication and a concealed drawstring at the waist. Zip fly with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener, side pockets and welt back pockets with a button. Slightly lower crotch and tapered legs with creases.
Straight-cut, off-the-shoulder dress in woven fabric with a wide elasticated flounce at the top.
Fitted, long-sleeved top in soft ribbed jersey.

Joggers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a ribbed, elasticated, drawstring waist and side pockets. Gently tapered legs with contrasting colour stripes down the sides and ribbed hems. The cotton content of the joggers is organic.

Chinos in cotton twill with elastication and a concealed drawstring at the waist, a zip fly and button, side pockets, and welt back pockets. Slim Fit – a fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.
Shaftless socks in a fine-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops. The socks are designed to be hidden inside your shoes.
Metal watch with a narrow, adjustable imitation leather strap and metal buckle. Width of strap 1.2 cm, total length 22 cm. Diameter of watch 3.8 cm.
Metal rings in various designs. Two decorated with resin beads.
Leggings in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Pull-on jeans in supersoft denim with a drawstring waist, and zip fly and press-stud. Side pockets, back pockets and slim legs with straight hems.
Large metal plate earrings. Length 7 cm.
Sleeveless playsuit in a soft viscose weave with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a flounce at the top. Elasticated seam at the waist, side pockets and wide legs.
Off-the-shoulder playsuit in a viscose weave with elastication at the top, short, wide sleeves, and an elasticated seam at the waist.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in soft jersey with a collar and button placket.
Braided headband in a soft knit.
Long-sleeved jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with terry appliqués. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short-sleeved lace blouse with a round neck and buttons down the back. Scalloped trims around the sleeves and hem and a slit at the back of the hem. Unlined.
T-shirt in soft viscose jersey with a slight sheen. Print motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline.

Body in woven fabric with a V-neck and wrapover bodice. Open back with a covered button at the back of the neck, long sleeves and wide cuffs with covered buttons. Seam at the hips, a lower jersey section and press-studs at the crotch.
Long-sleeved tops in soft, ribbed jersey. Press-studs on one shoulder (except in sizes 1-4Y). The cotton content of the tops is organic.
Fine-knit moccasins with soft terry inside, imitation leather trims and soft suede soles.
Cable-knit jumper in a mohair and wool blend with dropped shoulders, 3/4-length sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Top in soft jersey made from a cotton blend with a round neckline and long sleeves.
Lined triangle bikini top with padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a metal fastener at the back.
Sleeveless top in stretch jersey with a round neckline, concealed buttons down the front, yoke with a pleat at the back and a straight-cut hem.
Boat-neck top in soft, heavily draping jersey made from a viscose blend with a detachable tie belt at the waist and wide 3/4-length sleeves.
Fitted, cropped top in jersey made from a cotton blend.
Dress in soft cotton jersey with a rounded collar, press-studs at the back of the neck, long puff sleeves and a double-layered lace skirt.
Shoulder bag in grained imitation leather with a flap and zip at the top and a zipped inner compartment. Lined. Size 12x25x28 cm.

Oxford cotton shirt with a grandad collar, classic front and yoke with a pleat and hanger at the back. Open chest pocket, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.

Top in soft pile with a high collar, zip at the top, dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Zipped chest pocket in woven fabric, diagonal side pockets and an elasticated trim around the collar, cuffs and hem.
Joggers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems.

Blouse in an airy viscose weave with inset lace trims and pin-tucks. Round neck with an opening and concealed button at the back, flounces at the front that continue back over the shoulders, half-length, cuffed sleeves, and a smocked seam at the hem.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey.
Short shorts in stretch cotton twill with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and press-stud, front and back pockets and a lace trim at the hems.
Longer-style, straight-cut jacket in stretch jersey with notch lapels, patch front pockets and no fasteners. Unlined.
Treggings in stretch twill. Skinny fit with an easy pull-on elasticated waist, fake fly and fake front pockets.
Dress in soft, fine-knit cotton with a ribbed trim around the neckline, long sleeves and a gathered seam at the waist. Unlined.

Top and cardigan in soft cotton. Short-sleeved top in jersey with a rounded lace collar and opening with a button at the back of the neck. Fine-knit cardigan with long sleeves, buttons down the front, ribbing at the cuffs and hem and slits in the sides. Longer at the back.
Hairband in a checked cotton weave with a knot at the front.
Embossed metal earrings with a flat, round pendant with an embossed front and a thin hoop. Diameter approx. 3 cm, length 5 cm.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric with elasticated ribbing at the waist, pockets in the side seams and ribbed hems.
Trousers in washed, superstretch twill with fake front pockets, real back pockets and skinny legs. Low ribbed section at the waist.
Leggings in sturdy jersey with wide elastication at the waist.
Ankle-length trousers in stretch twill with a high waist, zip fly and button, back pockets and super-skinny legs.
Long, sleeveless dress in jersey with narrow shoulder straps and an elasticated seam at the waist. Unlined.
Blouse in a discreetly textured crêpe weave with a pleated, stand-up collar, V-neck with narrow ties at the top and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Lined.
Trousers in a crêpe weave with a high, elasticated waist, side pockets and tapered, ankle-length legs. The polyester content of the trousers is partly recycled.
Metal hoop earrings in various sizes and designs, two pairs with pendants. Diameter from approx. 1.6 cm to 3 cm.
Long-sleeved, polo-neck tops in organic cotton jersey.
Long-sleeved blouse in woven fabric with a V-neck, buttons down the front and a tie-front hem.
Sleeveless, knee-length dress in pleated jersey with a small stand-up collar, V-shaped opening at the front with ties at the top, and an elasticated seam at the waist. Unlined.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top. Bottoms with an elasticated waist.
Sleeveless, knee-length dress in a viscose crêpe weave with narrow, tie-top shoulder straps, elastication around the top and a smocked seam at the waist.
Knee-length dress in sequin-embroidered mesh with a V-neck, sewn-in wrapover at the front, an elasticated seam at the waist and short dolman sleeves. Lined.
Baby Exclusive. Trousers in slub jersey made from patterned organic cotton. Elasticated drawstring waist and a frill trim.
Jackets in organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood, zip down the front with a chin guard, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Dungarees in washed superstretch denim with worn details. Adjustable straps that cross at the back with metal fasteners, a chest pocket, fake front pockets and real back pockets. Press-studs at the sides and a fake fly.
Long-sleeved tops in slub cotton jersey with concealed press-studs on one shoulder. Two with a print and one with a chest pocket.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed denim with hard-worn details in a slightly looser fit. Regular waist, zip fly and button, slightly lower crotch and tapered legs with raw-edge hems.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey, one with an all-over print. Concealed press-stud on one shoulder and press-studs at the crotch.
Short, boat-neck dress in crêped mulberry silk with an opening and covered button at the back of the neck, 3/4-length sleeves with a seam and pleat at the ends, and a straight-cut hem. Lined.

Parka in washed cotton twill with a detachable, lined hood, stand-up collar and zip down the front with a chin guard. Handwarmer pockets and bellows front pockets with a flap and press-stud. Drawstring at the waist, elastication at the cuffs, and a single back vent. Lined.
Airy socks with elasticated tops. One pair with an embroidered pattern.
Joggers in soft, slightly stretchy denim with an elasticated drawstring waist, front pockets, a back pocket and tapered legs with covered elastication at the hems.
Bikini briefs in microfibre and lace with a mid waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back.

Bra top in soft fabric designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility. Removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and elasticated ribbing at the hem. No fasteners.
